item.title: Not Even Nvidia Can Fight the Fed
item.description: The tech rally proved short-lived as jobs data dashed hopes for a rate cut in December.

item.title: Digital Driver’s License? Apple and Illinois Get It. Your Business Should Too
item.description: Business owners should expect Apple’s New Digital ID technology to spread nationwide and expand to provide additional functionality.

item.title: Steve Jobs Said This is the Best Reason to Start Your Own Business
item.description: To Jobs, the only way to become ‘three dimensional’ is to completely own the process, and the results.

item.title: Starbucks’ CEO Is Making a Very Big Mistake—and It’s Destroying What Made the Company Great
item.description: Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol wants to return the world’s biggest coffeehouse to its roots, but his plan is doing the opposite.

item.title: Great Leaders Share 3 Rare Behaviors. Most Bosses Skip All of Them
item.description: They’re not complicated, but they’re uncommon—and they instantly raise trust and performance on any team.
